医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
NIH资金研究以开发改变游戏规则的HIV诊断工具截至2023年底，全球近4000万人居住在艾滋病毒中，其中包括美国约120万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/nih-funds-research-to-develop-develop-a-game-changing-hiv-diarostic-tool.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/nih-funds-research-to-develop-develop--a-game-changing-hiv-diarostic-tool.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51D4197A-BEE1-424B-B83B-9E88AAA58B019 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 12:13:12 -0400 NIH funds research to develop a game-changing HIV diagnostic tool
研究揭示了IBD种族和族裔群体中医疗保健利用的差异今天发表在《美国胃肠病学杂志》上的一项研究揭示了美国炎症性肠病（IBD）的种族和族裔群体之间的医疗保健利用差异很大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-reveals-disparities-in-healthcare-utilization-Among-Among-racial-ang-racial-and-chinnic-groups-with-ibd.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-reveals-disparities-in-healthcare-utilization-utilization-among-racial-ang--racial-and-racial-and-achinnic-groups-with-ibd.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee969bf5-7785-47E3-8048-212EC684D019 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 12:04:25 -0400 Study reveals disparities in healthcare utilization among racial and ethnic groups with IBD
视网膜成像和疾病干预的OCT演变Yifan Jian博士探讨了OCT的演变，视网膜成像方面的挑战以及AI在生物光谱方面的潜力，塑造了眼科诊断的未来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/the-evolution-of-oct-for-retinal-imaging-imaging-mimaging-incaging-and-imaging-ind-disease-intervention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/the-evolution-of-oct-for-retinal-imaging-mimaging-mimaging-incaging-ind-imaging-ind-imaging-ind-risease-intervention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A9FEE729-42CB-48D2-AC34-BBBB878F986D46 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 11:14:00 -0400 The evolution of OCT for retinal imaging and disease intervention
新方法加快了年轻患者的个性化癌症治疗一支加拿大泛美团队通过在鸡蛋中种植肿瘤并分析其蛋白质，开发了一种新的方法来快速为年轻癌症患者找到个性化治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/new-apphach-speed-peed-personalized-cancer-cancer-treatment-for-young-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/new-apphach-speed-peed-personalized-cancer-cancer-treatment-for-young-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AC940D60-92FB-4D53-907E-B1B2891CCBDA Tue, 01 Apr 2025 10:48:25 -0400 New approach speeds up personalized cancer treatment for young patients
研究将亚油酸与三阴性乳腺癌生长联系起来根据Weill Cornell Medicine研究者的一项陶艺研究，亚油酸是一种在大豆和红花油等种子油中发现的omega-6脂肪酸，以及包括猪肉和鸡蛋在内的动物产品，特别增强了难以治疗的“三重阴性”乳腺癌亚型的生长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-links-linoleic-acid-acid-to-triple-negation-negation-breast-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/study-links-linoleic-acid-acid-to-triple-triple-negative-breast-cancer-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43098b8c-57A2-4EF4-4-86C1-72F1E19679BB Tue, 01 Apr 2025 10:26:08 -0400 Study links linoleic acid to triple-negative breast cancer growth
新的TIL疗法可提高治疗的转移性胃肠道癌患者的有效性一种新形式的肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞（TIL）疗法是一种个性化的癌症免疫疗法形式，可极大地提高了该治疗疗法在转移性胃肠道癌患者中的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/new-til-therapy-improves-wartments-wartments-effectives-in-patients-in-patients-with-metanctatic-gastrointestinal-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/new-til-therapy-improves-wareatments-wartments-effectives-in-patients-in-patients-with-metanctatic-metastatic-gastrointestinal-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c658ffa1-d785-4d04-9ac9-6019dabc0831 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 10:15:31 -0400 New TIL therapy improves treatment's effectiveness in patients with metastatic gastrointestinal cancers
新工具有助于预测淋巴瘤患者的汽车治疗结果Researchers with City of Hope, one of the largest and most advanced cancer research and treatment organizations in the United States, with its National Medical Center in Los Angeles ranked among the nation's top 5 cancer centers by US News & World Report, and MSK have created a tool that uses machine learning to assess a non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL) patient's likely response to chimeric antigen receptor (CAR) T cell therapy before starting the treatment, according to study results published today in Nature Medicine. https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/new-tool-helps-predict-car-t-therapy-comes-for-lymphoma-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/new-tool-helps-predict-car-t-therapy-utcomes-for-lymphoma-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AB06EFD7-2DD6-4251-9824-269D019272CF Tue, 01 Apr 2025 09:54:51 -0400 New tool helps predict CAR T therapy outcomes for lymphoma patients
通过AI和高通量实验的增压下一代抗体发现自动化和机器学习正在改变LaBGenius的抗体发现，而EVA™平台可实现快速，高通量的实验过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/supercharging-next-next-gen-antibody-discovery-with-ai--ai-and-high-high-throughput-experimentation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/supercharging-next-next-gen-antibody-discovery-with-ai-and-ai-and-high-thigh-thoughput-pperimentation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3206bb6-eb63-4b90-97fd-1b78Aec7761f Tue, 01 Apr 2025 09:45:00 -0400 Supercharging Next-Gen Antibody Discovery with AI and High-Throughput Experimentation
科学家在眼动检测技术方面取得了突破眼睛跟踪在最新的虚拟和增强现实耳机中起着至关重要的作用，并且是娱乐行业，科学研究，医学和行为科学，汽车驾驶援助和工业工程的重要技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/scientist-achieve-achieve-breakthrough-in-eye-movement-detection-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/scientist-achieves-achieve-breakthrough-in-eye-movement-movement-detection-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61da82a82a9-f065-4258-a5e9-7aa2866984d5 Tue, 01 Apr 2025 07:55:38 -0400 Scientists achieve breakthrough in eye movement detection technology
特朗普说，他将停止医疗保健欺诈者。上次，他让他们走路。五年前，东南部最大的疼痛临床公司之一的首席执行官因在一项400万美元的非法回扣计划中被定罪后被判处三年以上的徒刑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/trump-says-hee28099ll-stop-stop-health-care-fraudster-fraudsters-last-time-time-time-let-let-them-walk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250401/trump-says-hee28099ll-stop-health-care-fraudsters-last-last time-time-time-time-let-them-them-walk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d78f840b-9511-44eb-b44c-b44c-b44c-f7fbf63230ba Tue, 01 Apr 2025 06:54:56 -0400 Trump says he’ll stop health care fraudsters. Last time, he let them walk.
